short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Research brilliantly with your AI collaborator. Ask anything, clip, and compare across sites. Works with your favorite web tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔍 Ask anything while you browse
Summarize websites or PDFs. Get answers to articles. Cove allows you to perform complex research instantly.

🧠 Powerful AI
Harness the power of the most advanced AI models all in one place. Cove automatically blends the best of Anthropic’s Claude, OpenAI’s ChatGPT, Meta, and Perplexity. 

🙌 AI that actually edits with you 
All content is directly editable by both you and your AI collaborator, so you can build off each other’s ideas. Cove’s AI can even make precise edits without having to re-stream a whole answer.

🌊 Integrates with your workflow
Use AI in your workflow alongside all your favorite websites and apps—email, docs, CRM, and more—with no special integration needed  

✂️ Collect and compare content across sites
Cove sees what you see, and travels with you as you browse the web. Looking at a LinkedIn profile? Ask Cove, “Add this to my table of sales prospects." Cove automatically organizes information for you as you collect it.

💡 Never get stuck 
Cove suggests new ideas at each step of your journey, anticipating your next moves and taking you to unexpected places.

🗄️ Save anything you want to remember
Clip text, images or full web pages to your Cove spaces. The more you save, the more Cove becomes an expert in the information that matters most to you. Say goodbye to getting buried in browser tabs—build a home base of your collected knowledge.

🌈 A wide open space to explore with AI
Working on something big? Expand the Cove side panel into a wide open canvas and organize your thoughts visually. You can also invite friends and teammates to join in. 

Go to Cove.ai to learn more
Questions, suggestions, feedback? Email us at help@cove.ai
